title: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch reported missing after superyacht sinks off Sicily
content: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch is missing after the sinking of a superyacht off the coast of Sicily, sources familiar with the matter told CNBC.

title: GM lays off more than 1,000 salaried software and services employees
